siteConfig.name: ITRANSL8
siteConfig.description: AI Video Generation and Voice Over for Everyone

features.title: Revolutionize Your Video Content with Global Translations
features.description: ITRANSL8 revolutionizes video translation, offering you seamless access to 21 languages at the touch of a button. Whether it's content from YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, or Twitter, or directly from your computer, our platform delivers unmatched quality at the most competitive price. Dive into a borderless digital experience today and bring your videos to a global audience with ease

features.title: Global Reach, Local Touch
features.description: ITRANSL8 is more than a translation service; it's a bridge to a global audience. With just one click, translate your videos into 21 languages, ensuring your message reaches far and wide. Whether uploading from social media or directly from your device, we guarantee a seamless, quality experience that's unmatched in affordability. Let's take your content global

features.title: Speak Everyone's Language, Effortlessly
features.description: Unlock the full potential of your video content with ITRANSL8's one-click translation solution. Cater to a global audience by translating your videos into 21 different languages, without sacrificing quality or your budget. Our intuitive platform supports uploads from your computer or directly from social media, ensuring your message is heard loud and clear, everywhere

features.title: From Local to Global: Transform Your Videos
features.description: ITRANSL8 offers a unique opportunity to elevate your videos from local favorites to global hits. Our AI-driven translations into 21 languages ensure your content resonates with a worldwide audience. Easy uploads, whether from your device or social media, combined with our competitive pricing, make ITRANSL8 the go-to solution for creators seeking a broader reach

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: What is Itansl8?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Itansl8 is a platform that specializes in creating natural AI voices in any language and style. Whether you're a content creator, an author, a game developer, or building chatbots, ElevenLabs provides advanced AI technology and intuitive tools to enhance your audio experiences. Here are some key features.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: What is included ?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Itansl8 lets you generate high-quality spoken audio in any voice, style, and language. Their AI model renders human intonation and inflections with unrivaled fidelity, adjusting the delivery based on context. You can use it for videos, gaming, AI chat bots audio books.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Why would I want to use Itansl8?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Generate lifelike speech in any language and voice. Customize vocal clarity, stability, or animated delivery. Ideal for digital creators, it provides high-quality TTS streaming instantly. Adjust voice outputs effortlessly through an intuitive interface. Turn text into lifelike audio across various languages and accents.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: I am confused with pricing
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Our product is completely free and with scaling usage price increases. The pricing section could be good place to start. We have plans and intentions to make this better product for wide range of users.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Is it easy to use? How do I get started?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Itansl8 is extremely easy to use. You can get started by registering.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Is the product actively maintained?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Yes! We're continuously enhancing our platform by adding exciting new features and refining existing ones. Our dedicated team is committed to delivering the best experience for our users. Stay tuned for regular updates! If you want to be the first to know about major releases, consider signing up for our newsletter. Don't worry—we won't spam you; we promise!
